snippet: Schools should mandate vision screenings, as they do vaccinations.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Pamela F Gallin deplores fact that many children in New York City schools fail to have their vision tested regularly, which affects both their eyesight and scholastic performance; suggests that vision screenings need to be treated as seriously as vaccination requirements, and schools should be provided with uniform standards for vision assessments.
lead_paragraph: Schools should mandate vision screenings, as they do vaccinations.

headline.print_headline: Kids Who Can’t See Can’t Learn
headline.main: Kids Who Can’t See Can’t Learn
